title: Forced to quarantine due to positive Covid 19 test, can't go to masjid, what to do? Assim al hakeem
transcript: it's from saudi arabia because we're infected with kavit we are forced to quarantine and not go to the message what should we do with the missed prayers no not a problem pray home and pray on time and if you have someone else who's quarantined with you and you can pray jamaa among the males this is okay and if you if you don't have you're the only one who's infected then pray on your own and you will be rewarded as if you had prayed in the masjid bye
